job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes starver TFG18d setup 64b set filelist = `cat $FILELIST | awk '{print $1}'` echo "file list = ${filelist}" set NL = `echo ${filelist} | wc -l` echo "NL = ${NL}" if (${NL} == 0) exit 0; foreach input ( ${filelist} ) echo ${input} | grep ';' if (! $?) then set dir = `echo ${input} | awk -F\; '{print $1}'` set tag = `echo ${input} | awk -F\; '{print $2}'` else set dir = `dirname ${input}`; set tag = `basename ${input} .MuDst.root`; endif set log = ${tag}C.log if (! -r "${tag}.picoDst.root") then root.exe -q -b -x 'lMuDst.C(-1,"'${dir}'/'${tag}'.MuDst.root","RMuDst,mysql,magF,nodefault,picoWrite,quiet")' makePicoDst.C >& ${log} endif end
